name: Santa's Truck
description:
Explore an island and find all the houses to deliver presents.

The game was created in 48 hours for Yogscast Game Jam 2019.

Unzip and run GiftDel.exe to play.

Keys:

  • WASD or Arrows to drive
  • Space for handbrake
  • R if you get stuck
  • P for pause
  • Shift+Esc to quit
  • Alt+Enter to change from Fullscreen to Window

Sorry for the large file size, no time to optimise at the moment.
